context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: reach out to the medication manufacturer or a pharmaceutical assistance program

consult with her doctor about potential alternatives, generics or patient assistance programs
reach out to the pharmaceutical company that manufactures the medication, as they often have patient assistance programs or discounts for those who can't afford their medication

explore all alternative possibilities of funding her medication
seek financial assistance or explore other options
explore all available options to get the medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi service or a ride-share like Uber to get to the airport promptly
call a taxi, an Uber, or other ride service to get him to the airport as soon as possible
call a taxi, uber, or any other car service as quickly as possible to ensure he arrives at the airport in time for his flight
call for roadside assistance or a taxi as quickly as possible
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other quick transportation service
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride service immediately
call for a taxi or ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft in order to get to the airport as soon as possible
call for a taxi, Uber, or other car service as soon as possible while also contacting a towing company to handle the broken-down car
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-hailing service immediately
call for a cab, uber, or any other form of immediate transportation to the airport while also contacting a tow truck to handle his broken down car

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: check the day's sales receipts and transaction records to see if there was a miscount or misunderstanding
notify his higher-ups or the owner of the situation to explain the discrepancy
check the security camera footage to see if there was any theft or any incidents that led to the loss of money
contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery and honestly report what he has found

thoroughly check his surroundings, review the sales records, security camera footage (if available), and talk to the other employees who were working with him during the shift to find out what might have happened to the missing money
immediately report the discrepancy to his superiors or the owner of the bakery
check the security footage if available, to see if he could identify whether the money was stolen or if it was a cashier error
check the surveillance cameras to determine whether any theft has occurred
try to remember or find out where the money could have gone, possibly by checking surveillance footage if available or speaking to employees who have used the register
thoroughly check his own calculations and make sure an error wasn't made

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.

generation: stay in one place and try to make a visible signal that can be seen from the air
stay where they are and avoid wandering off unnecessarily
stay put and make themselves as visible as possible
stay put
create a shelter to protect himself and his friends from the cold
